name: Very Very Hungry Cat
description:
The idea was…

  • Super cozy indoor Cat Environment!
  • Ever-hungry Cat character that is always hungry!
  • Upgradable furniture to make “CAT” feel comfy!
  • A whole bunch of animals to feed the cat!

The game turned out as…

  • CAT feels very comfy… which is the MOST important thing ladies and gentlemen!
  • UEBER cozy Outdoor Cat Environment!
  • Ever-hungry Cat character that is always very hungry!
  • The Cat gets one BIG fish to eat and should stop complaining, goddamnit ;)! 

Thx team #LudumDare and thx to everyone who developed a game here.
This community is fantastic!

Jot
